fields.label: URL to Map Service containing documents:
fields.tooltip: Map Service that contains filenames of documents(pdfs) relative to the document directory.  It should have a url field that contains the name of the PDF.

fields.label: URL to the Documents directory:
fields.tooltip: This is the root directory where all the documents available from the map service below are hosted.

fields.label: Flag link:
fields.tooltip: URL to redirect to when the flag is clicked.

fields.label: About link:
fields.tooltip: URL for the about link.
